name: In 30 Seconds or Less
description:
In 30 Seconds Or Less is a Work In Progress.

In 30 Seconds Or Less is a short, level runner game where you must use the power of time travel and a jetpack to deliver pizzas while being chased by cybernetically enhanced raccoons. There's got to be better reasons to destroy the space time continuum.

Use Space to Jump, WASD to move, and Crouch to Slide.

Avoid the signs and red obstacles to make it to the wormhole at the end. 

Press Esc to exit at any time.

Gameplay will be based around timed levels where you must dodge enemy pizza propaganda, evade the cybernetic raccoons, and collect alternate timeline pizzas to extend your time and make your delivery.
